p: In total, three farrowing groups (sows and suckling pigs) showed clinical signs of PED and increased loss rates in suckling pigs (10 to 30%). Morbidity reached 60 to 90% in sows and 70 to 100% in piglets (see Table 1). Some of the weaned piglets also showed diarrhea, wasting, and growth retardation. The overall losses in piglet rearing rose to 5 to 10% (details see Table 1).
